This process worked for me:

Install Medal Of Honor Airborne with the KEYGEN from the HATRED folder on the Medal Of Honor Airborne.iso disc but DO NOT install (copy) the Hatred Crack.

Instead UPGRADE to 1.1 by opening the "Medal Of Honor Airborne Update 1.1 [dopeman]" folder and following the instructions below. (verified, this works):


  A 5 step process. Follow carefully.


 #1 Open folder 'Original_exe' and copy the two files to the game folders following path:

    Medal of Honor Airborne\UnrealEngine3\Binaries -and choose YES to overwrite.


 #2 Right-Click and choose to open file 'setup.reg' with NOTEPAD.

    CHANGE THE FOLLOWING LINE TO MATCH WHERE YOU HAVE PLACED THE GAME FOLDER:    
    "Install Dir"="C:\\Medal of Honor Airborne"

    BE SURE to leave the double \\ between each path.
    EXAMPLE: If you placed the game in your programs folder, you would change the line to read:

    "Install Dir"="C:\\Program Files\\Electronic Arts\\Medal of Honor Airborne"

    After correctly making change, save your change, THEN double-click 'setup.reg' to enter
    the changes to your registry. (Windows XP and Vista might be different but basically the same)


 #3 Now run 1.moha.dl.0.1081_Patch.exe to update the game.

 #4 Copy the new 1.1 Crack exe to your Medal of Honor Airborne\UnrealEngine3\Binaries folder
    and choose yes to overwrite.


 #5 Play the game. -v.1.1

For all those whose game are not installing.
The problem is physx.
Go to control panel and uninstall the ageia or nvidia physx drivers and then install the game again.

Thanks for compressing it. Thanks to that, we have to download a whole 4.5 meg less. Of course, unpacking 6.5 gigs is much faster than downloading additional 4 megs.

Let me phrase it the other way: if people need to have additional 6.5 gigs of space for the unpacked files, they are more likely to remove the torrent files just after downloading them. If the torrent contained unpacked file, it will be much easier to seed it.

For all of you who have problem with installation stopping after choosing physx language, go to: Control Panel - Add/Remove programs - and delete your Physx drivers, so the game can install them. Then it will proceed.
Well done that man, sound advice, thanks!
